summary: The Wendigo is a scary monster from Algonquian stories. It's like a giant icy person who makes people want to eat other people. Just thinking about it gives you the chills! This idea is used in scary books and movies. Some people even think there's a real sickness called "Wendigo psychosis" where people get these weird cravings and fears. It's like the monster is inside their heads!
title: Wendigo
